title: Introducing: Bright Beast
content:
Made up of members from LA bands One Trick Pony and The Transmissions, Bright Beast’s couple of debut tracks embody such a unique, enthralling characteristic.

So their artwork and general presentation might be slightly questionable, there’s no doubting the quality shown on their self-titled EP. Driven by brooding bass lines and a steady percussion section, (war paint) comes across like a more funky almost tribal inspired Interpol whilst (camera) could easily pass for an early TV on the Radio single. Having played their premiere show in LA back in November, and with a EP expected later this month, I’m expecting big things from Bright Beast.
